item.title: HP Chromebook 11 Compared to Acer C720
item.description: This video presents a side-by-side comparison of the HP Chromebook 11 and the Acer C720.

item.title: HP Chromebook 14 Compared to HP Chromebook 11
item.description: In this video Robby Payne of Chrome Unboxed compares the HP Chromebook 14 and the HP Chromebook 11. Performance-wise the 14-inch model is clearly the winner.

item.title: Clash of the Chromebooks: Acer C720P vs Acer 710
item.description: The kick-off video to the Chromebooks Clash series where YouTuber TechHarvest compares the Acer C710 to the Acer C720P Chromebook.
